text: there's an "icon" field in custom modules that has some standard font awesome icons that will do this for you. Anything else requires copying and pasting the code into the field itself or changing the image picker field to a textarea where someone can copy and paste the SVG code. that's at least what I've done in the past, would love to see a hubl function for this but would require limiting image picker file types to svgs

<@U7V9DQ31P> I need custom SVG and the ability to keep them within the file system so they can all be changed simultaneously across the entire site, so this isn’t really an option for me. Even if we could get a file picker that was just called “Icons” or something that only did this functionality, it’d be awesome. I have done workarounds with jquery’s `.load()` in the past when I really needed it to work and couldn’t find a solution, but that isn’t ideal.
